Girl, not woman. Man, not boy

Out of the superheroes that have gendered names,

female characters tend to have dimunitive or sexualised names.

30%

20%

10%

0%

10%

20%

30%

lady

lord

girl

boy

woman

man

princess

prince

mother

father

ms.

maid

30% of male characters with gendered

names have 'man' in their name,

versus only 6% for 'woman'

doll

13% of female characters with gendered names

have 'girl' in their names, versus only 5% for boy

Based on work by Amanda Shendruk | The Pudding

NOTES: Percentages are determined only from characters with gendered names.

I.e. 13 percent of women with gendered names have “girl” in their name.
